actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_sumtotal as (SELECT video_id,created_time,MAX(cast(sad as decimal)
													  ) as Total_sad
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
 WHERE view_date >= '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date
  AND view_date < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date
	AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
	and name is not null
group by video_id,created_time),
CTE_view_date as (SELECT video_id,created_time,cast(sad as decimal) as sad
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
WHERE view_date = '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date
	and name is not null
									AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
group by video_id,created_time,sad)
select sum(CTE_sumtotal.Total_sad-coalesce(CTE_view_date.sad,0))
as Total_sad
from CTE_sumtotal full join CTE_view_date on CTE_sumtotal.video_id=CTE_view_date.video_id
